author: gsorrentino18
body:
#### PR description:

Two new plugins have been added to monitor and validate BTL and ETL reco clusters, cluster-track association and primary vertex time (@pmeridian @parbol).

#### PR validation:

The new code has been tested in the release CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-02-28-2300. The size of the new histograms on disk is: 
569.70 KiB       MTD/ETL
283.18 KiB        MTD/BTL
compared with the previous size:
476.28 KiB       MTD/ETL
234.96 KiB       MTD/BTL

Some validation histograms for BTL and ETL reco objects:

BTL cluster time:
![BTLClusterTime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701605-5baaa480-5cb4-11ea-9af9-445312feec50.png)

BTL cluster-track association efficiency as a function of eta:
![BTLEtaEfficiency](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701606-5c433b00-5cb4-11ea-90d7-d49d32099b42.png)

BTL track time at the reference point:
![BTLTrackTime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701637-68c79380-5cb4-11ea-9a2f-1d835d115305.png)

ETL cluster time:
![ETLClusterTime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701651-6f560b00-5cb4-11ea-82ba-eb2e1454dddf.png)

ETL cluster-track association efficiency as a function of phi:
![ETLPhiEfficiency](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701654-6feea180-5cb4-11ea-8580-786944a4fea6.png)

Primary vertex time:
![VertexTime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39314729/75701655-70873800-5cb4-11ea-899a-a9cad6e530d8.png)
title: MTD Validation Update
